task: Test and check all Smoke Alarms and Carbon Monoxide Detectors.
Check the Fire Extinguisher (if installed) is in date and the dial indicates GREEN.
Check Fire Blanket (if installed) is in date (1yr - Date on back of holder)
Check the Torch is available within the unit / Emergency Lights are working
Check that the Fire Action Notice is displayed in the unit.
If the unit has gas appliances (Cooker/Oven/Fire): Check these are OFF (Not the boiler) and make a visual check for any damage.
Check/set boiler radiator temperature dials/display is set to ECO / 55 degrees celcius.
Check/set boiler hot water temperature dials/display is set to 55 degrees celcius.
Check all plugs/sockets and cables for any visible damage/scorch marks.
Check all shower heads and taps are free from scale and dirt.
Check the Cooker Extraction Filters are clean. Clean if required.
Turn on the Cooker Extraction & listen for any irregular noise from the motor.
Turn off the Extraction after checking.
Visually inspect the Cooker Extraction Internals. (Filters out)
Are all furniture, fixtures, and fittings free from obvious defects?
Is the unit free from sharp edges?
Check for any items in the unit that could cause a slip/trip or fall.
Check all internal and external lights are working.
Check all openable windows in sleeping areas are functioning correctly.
Check all windows are closed and secure.
Check door retainer is working correctly.
Check access steps are safe, secure, and free from damage/debris/litter/algae/moss.
Are decked areas in good condition and free from slip/trip hazards i.e. have non-slip surfaces that are free from debris/litter/algae/moss.
